message.body: Want to go to a soccer game next Tuesday? Laura doesn't want to go
Yes, can we take the brauhas bus?
We will be missing Brazil v Mexico
But I am totally ok with that
I think we can see both, the Brazil game is at three and the union game is at seven
This is stacking up to be an awesome day
Hahaha
It is an open cup game so i don't know I'd they are running a bus but I'm trying to find out
Great, let me know if they are.
Also, what is an open cup game?
Yeah i will. I sent them a message and if they don't respond I'll probably just call them tomorrow
Great, thanks!
Its like England's fa cup where its a single elimination tournament across all the divisions in soccer
The union is playing a second division team so we will probably wallop them
I can't imagine why they wouldn't have a bus for that
But also the unions coach just got fired today so I'm interested to see what the line up will look like under the interim guy
Woah crazy, I guess that was long over due
Yeah he acquired some really good players and made some good trades but he proved he can't coach
Yeah they were losing a lot of games for no real reason. I watched some on tv, it was frustrating,
Also, do you know where yr going to watch the u.s. Ghana game Monday? Laura and i are meeting a friend of ours at that bar on second street across from Stella
Yeah this is the best roster wee have had in the team's history, there is no reason we should be losing this much
I didn't have plans yet but that sounds great.
Where is Stella ?
Its the pizzeria on second street about a block or two north of south street
Oh yeah sounds good to me!
God dammit, no beer bus for the game next week
Well we will navigate the trains, I will bring some road sodas
Sounds like a plan. Taking the train isn't too bad
Sounds good to me
Is the us Ghana game at the dark horse?
Yeah i think that's the name of the place, i would think they would be showing it
I like that place. It's a dark Irish bar
Yeah
Its not too big either
Good choice
